scripts.serve: ! [ -f ./functions/.env ] && echo "ERROR: \"./functions/.env\" is missing" || firebase serve --only functions -p 5000 -o $(ifconfig | grep -Eo 'inet (addr:)?([0-9]*\.){3}[0-9]*' | grep -Eo '([0-9]*\.){3}[0-9]*' | grep -v '127.0.0.1')
scripts.deploy: yarn backup_commit; ! [ -f ./functions/.env ] && echo "ERROR: \"./functions/.env\" is missing" || firebase deploy --only functions
